customer_reviews.title: Great Hard Drive!!!  Takes a beating!!
customer_reviews.text: Great Hard Drive. I work in a very rough environment in the Offshore Dredging industry and my equipment is subject to vibration, dust, mud, rain, you name it. The built in cable is a plus because you know you dont have any chance of getting mud or dust introduced into the internal components. Some say its bulky, but its very stout. If you need a hard drive that will take a beating and come back for more, this is WELL worth the minimal investment. Don't buy junk because its $30 or $40 bucks cheaper. You will be glad you bought this. I've owned mine for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Neill

customer_reviews.title: This product has the poorest user interface and poor use instructions to match
customer_reviews.text: This product has the poorest user interface and poor use instructions to match. I still cannot determine how to use it. I downloaded the EaseUS backup software (since the supplied software is terrible) and the one backup I successfully did mysteriously was deleted. Moreover, even after I unlock it, I cannot seem to be able to add a folder or really do anything with it. It is pointless developing a superior hardware product if you cannot successfully inform people how to use it. Even if you are an intermediate user, do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Anoname

customer_reviews.title: NOT a 2TB drive and no USB-C
customer_reviews.text: Good price and fast drive. The downside is there is no USB-C cable so speed is automatically limited. The drive casing is a bit larger than expected; but with the promise of great protection from drops, spills, and other minor mishaps. 256 bit encryption with NFC security card included. Even after removing the very small amount of included software, the useable space on this drive is 1.81TB. Might not seem like a big deal. But that is a loss of nearly 200GB of drive space!!!

product_meta.title: Buffalo MiniStation Extreme NFC USB 3.0 1 TB Rugged Portable Hard Drive (HD-PZN1.0U3B),Black
product_meta.description: Size:1TBMiniStation Extreme NFC is a rugged portable hard drive equipped with a unique wrap-around USB cable and secure hardware encryption. Built in NFC technology allows users to unlock and access files on their hard drive using the included smartcard without having to remember a password and protects your data in case of loss. MiniStation Extreme NFC features US Military Standard shock protection with a ruggedized chassis and specialized bumpers designed to absorb and transfer shock away from the hard disk due to accidental bumps and drops from up to 1. 2 meters and is water and dust resistant. Simply plug the convenient wrap-around cable into any available USB port on your computer and instantly add capacity or store files to take on the road; with 256-bit AES hardware encryption, you can rest assured your data is safe, wherever you go. Store, back up and transport your content safely and securely.
feature_bullets: USB PC Compatible plug-and-play. Compatible w/ Mac after formatting.
